mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND WARE_DV_CD = '2' /* 서비스센터 */ AND WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{strRgstDt},1,6)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM () P1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND P1.SVPD_ITEM_KND = '7' AND P1.SVPD_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
SELECT P1.SVPD_MGT_UNT AS MNGT_UNIT /* 관리단위 */ FROM () P1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND P1.SVPD_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
SELECT #{strTpCd} || #{strRgstDt} || LPAD(SQ_SVST_ITM_STR_IZ$ITM_STR_NO.NEXTVAL,7,'0') AS ITM_STR_NO /* 품목입고번호 */ FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT /* 카운트숫자*/ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_CL_IZ /* 월별창고마감내역 */ WHERE APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{strRgstDt},1,6) AND WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} AND WARE_CL_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_SVST_ITM_STR_IZ ( ITM_STR_NO /* 품목입고번호 */ , STR_SN /* 입고일련번호 */ , STR_TP_CD /* 입고유형코드 */ , STR_RGST_DT /* 입고등록일자 */ , STR_WARE_NO /* 입고창고번호 */ , WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ , WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD /* 창고관리파트너조직유형코드 */ , STR_WARE_DV_CD /* 입고창고구분코드 */ , DRT_STR_YN /* 직접입고여부 */ , ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , ITM_GD_CD /* 품목등급코드 */ , MNGT_UNIT_CD /* 관리단위코드 */ , STR_QTY /* 입고수량 */ , STR_CONF_DT /* 입고확인일자 */ , STR_CONF_HH /* 입고확인시간 */ , STR_CONF_PRTNR_NO /* 입고확인파트너번호 */ , STR_CONF_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD /* 입고확인파트너조직유형코드 */ , RMK_CN /* 비고내용 */ , DTA_DL_YN /* 데이터삭제여부 */ ) VALUES ( #{itmStrNo} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(STR_SN),0) +1 FROM TB_SVST_ITM_STR_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND ITM_STR_NO = #{itmStrNo}) , #{strTpCd} , #{strRgstDt} , #{strWareNo} , ( SELECT WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{strRgstDt}, 1, 6) AND WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} ) , (SELECT OG_TP_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{strRgstDt}, 1, 6) ) , '2' , 'N' , #{itmPdCd} , #{itmGdCd} , #{mngtUnit} , #{strQty} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') , #{session.employeeIDNumber} , #{session.ogTpCd} , #{rmkCn} , 'N'
)
mapper.select: SELECT P1.SVPD_PD_CD AS CODE_ID /* 품목상품코드 */ , '['|| P1.SVPD_PD_CD || ']' || P1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS CODE_NAME /* 품목코드명 */ FROM () P1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND P1.SVPD_ITEM_KND = #{itmKndCd} ORDER BY P1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1, P1.SVPD_PD_CD
SELECT WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{strRgstDt}, 1, 6) AND WARE_NO = #{strWareNo}

SELECT WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , NVL(PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) AS PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY /* 시점재고A등급수량 */ , NVL(PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) AS PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY /* 시점재고E등급수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} /* 창고번호 */ AND ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}

SELECT WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , NVL(PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) AS MONTHLY_PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY /* 시점재고A등급수량 */ , NVL(PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) AS MONTHLY_PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY /* 시점재고E등급수량 */ , NVL(ETC_STR_A_GD_QTY, 0) AS ETC_STR_A_GD_QTY /* 기타입고A등급수량 */ , NVL(ETC_STR_E_GD_QTY, 0) AS ETC_STR_E_GD_QTY /* 기타입고E등급수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_YM = SUBSTR(#{strRgstDt},1,6) AND WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} /* 창고번호 */ AND ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
SELECT WARE_NM AS STR_WARE_NM FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = #{apyYm} AND WARE_NO = #{strWareNo} AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT T1.PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD , T1.PD_ABBR_NM AS ITM_PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T2.PD_CD = T1.PD_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '7' AND T1.SAP_MAT_CD = LPAD(#{sapCd}, 18, '0')

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(T1.SAP_MAT_CD)) AS SAP_CD , T1.PD_ABBR_NM AS ITM_PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T2.PD_CD = T1.PD_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '7' AND T1.PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
